<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">* Are You Gregnant? Do you =
know someone who is Gregnant? (Pregnant by a person named Greg?) Great, =
send them my way! Please help me in my quest to find all of the amazing =
Gregnant women in the greater NYC area. If I can find enough of us, I =
plan to throw the first-ever all-Gregnant-party. There will be dancing, =
tomfoolery, pregnancy burlesque shows, belly painting, and all sorts of =
mischief for this special selection of people. If you are Gregnant, =
please fill out this form: www.gregnant.mom or email =
glittermilkpresents@gmail.com. =
https://www.instagram.com/glitterr.milk/</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">XXXXX SPECTRE PRIORITY =
XXXXX</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Before it had a name, Spectre =
Event Horizon Group used to meet at a bar to commiserate and grok the =
increasingly sci-fi present. Along the way #SPECTRE developed an online =
platform for sharing specialized investigative research, presented as =
gossip for non-specialists, all searchable here: spectrevision.net. =
Excerpts are compiled for Nonsense by J. Sinopoli. Please recommend =
relevant search terms or search results to =
spectre.event.horizon.group]at]gmail.com.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">***** Pirate Abolitionists =
*****</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span =
style=3D"">https://spectrevision.net/2023/11/21/pirate-abolitionists/</spa=
n></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">"Not only did the infamous =
pirates wreak millions in damages, but they sowed havoc among the human =
traffickers along the coast, burning and exploding their ships and =
ports, bringing the trade nearly to a standstill. Once these pirates had =
been caught and 'summarily dealt with,' Britain=E2=80=99s Royal African =
Company was able to rebuild their horrific trade, allowing the newer =
British model of chattel slavery to become the predominant form of =
enslavement in the U.S."</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">XXXXX LEARNING XXXXX =
</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Learning is something you do, =
but it=E2=80=99s also a reflection of who you=E2=80=99d like to be. We =
like to be cheap and eclectic, with a mix of classes or events that will =
make our world a little bigger and more interesting. Who do you want to =
be? Maybe it's in here.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">One-time listings are =
categorized weekly, with general recurring classes listed at the end on =
the first Friday of each month.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Learning is compiled and =
edited weekly by Corinne Brenner. Please send listing suggestions to =
learning]at]nonsensenyc.com.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">***** LEARNING: SATURDAY =
*****</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Introduction to Birdwatching =
Outings</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Whether you=E2=80=99re just =
starting out or have already joined the birding ranks, this introductory =
outings is for you. Every Saturday, join Prospect Park Alliance and a =
member of the Brooklyn Bird Club on an introductory walk to learn the =
basics of birding and search for the dozens of species that visit =
Prospect Park through all seasons.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">All levels are welcome and =
walks will begin at the Prospect Park Audubon Center. No registration =
necessary. Children under 12 must be accompanied by an adult. Please =
bring binoculars if you have them.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Route Description: This outing =
is at a leisurely pace with lots of stops to observe birds. A different =
route through the park may be taken each week. There may be steps, =
slight inclines, and grass and dirt paths with exposed roots. We will =
cover approximately 1.5-2 miles.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Brooklyn Bird =
Club</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Audubon Center, Prospect Park =
near Lincoln Drive entrance, Brooklyn</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">10a-noon; =
$free</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span =
style=3D"">prospectpark.org/event/introduction-to-birdwatching-outings/202=
3-11-25/</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">***** LEARNING: SATURDAY =
*****</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Lingerie Making =
Workshop</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Design and sew a =
made-to-measure bralette with Rue du Paradis, a bespoke, high-end =
lingerie brand.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Receive a custom pattern to =
your measurements. Select a lace and band from the lace bar. Sew your =
own bespoke bralette with step-by-step instructions. An unmissable =
four-hour experience. No sewing experience needed. Workshops are held =
Thursday through Sunday.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Rue du =
Paradis</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Building 5, Industry City, 51 =
35th Street, Brooklyn</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">10:30a-2:30p; =
$150</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span =
style=3D"">industrycity.com/event/rue-du-paradis-lingerie-making-workshop-=
23/</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">***** LEARNING: SATURDAY =
*****</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Radical History Walking =
Tour</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Museum of Reclaimed Urban =
Space organic historian Bill Weinberg reveals the stories behind squats, =
gardens, riots, uprisings and more. =46rom the Civil War Draft Riots of =
the 1860s to the Young Lords, Black Panthers, hippies, Yippies and Up =
Against the Wall Motherf*ckers of the 1960s, to the Tompkins Square =
anarchists of the =E2=80=9980s, to the tree-hugging urban enviros of the =
=E2=80=9990s to the neighborhood Earthies keeping the legacy alive =
today. Unlike other neighborhood tours, we broaden beyond individual =
anecdotes to paint a strong historical, academic, and cultural big =
picture of the Lower East Side.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Five things you will learn on =
the Lower East Side Radical History Tour that you probably didn=E2=80=99t =
know:</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">1. The radical politics of the =
songwriter who penned the =E2=80=9CWizard of Oz=E2=80=9D soundtrack. 2. =
What building in the East Village links the Gershwin brothers, the Black =
Panthers, and Iggy Pop. 3. What park in the East Village was the secret =
birthplace of both the Hare Krishna movement and Occupy Wall Street. 4. =
How New York City=E2=80=99s recycling program began as an initiative of =
East Village community activists. 5. Why the same area of the city has =
been variously known as Burnt Mill Point, Drydock, Little Germany, Klein =
Deutschland, the Lower East Side, Loisaida, the East Village, and =
Alphabet City. Tours need three people to run, and almost always =
do.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Museum of Reclaimed Urban =
Space</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">155 Avenue C, between 9th and =
10th streets, Manhattan</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">3-5p; =
$20</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span =
style=3D"">morusnyc.org/radical-history-tour/</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">***** LEARNING: MONDAY =
*****</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Sound 101 for =
Everyone</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">This class is to give anyone =
who works with and around sound a solid understanding of the fundamental =
principles of SOUND. We will look at everything from acoustic theory, =
dsp, how hardware works, useful software, and everything in between. =
There will be an open ended portion at the end of the class for further =
questions and discussion, and the class will mold itself to the needs of =
the folks taking it.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">This course will take a dive =
into every aspect of sound. My goal is to have you, the eager new(or =
old) disciple of sound, to walk away feeling like you have a basic grasp =
of how the things we hear come into being. The knowledge gained in this =
course will benefit everyone from artists to technicians to venue =
managers, even your grandma would learn something she can use. The class =
will be in three parts, the first being more of a lecture on the =
principles of sound, the second being a hands on to learn how we use and =
interact with equipment and our surroundings. The third is open ended, =
time to go over anything that confused you or to cover things that =
didn=E2=80=99t come up, whatever is helpful for the class. Bring your =
questions and your listening ears, that=E2=80=99s all you =
need.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">The =
Brick</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">579 Metropolitan Avenue, =
Brooklyn</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">6-9p lecture, 9-10p Q&amp;A; =
$25-50</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span =
style=3D"">bricktheater.com/sound-101-for-everyone-with-jimmy-kavetas/</sp=
an></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">***** LEARNING: WEDNESDAY =
*****</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Tieknots: A Hands-On Intro on =
How to Count, Describe, and Tie Tieknots</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Tying tieknots can range from =
mandatory chore that you just want to get through, to a means of =
self-expression in a part of fashion where self-expression is limited. =
But how might one describe and share how to tie a particular knot? And =
can we use a systematic enough description to count how many tieknots =
could exist, and see whether the ones people use are rare or =
common?</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">My research enumerating =
tieknots has been a question on Qi, has been heckled on NPR and helped =
get me a green card to the US. In this class I will share how counting =
tieknots can be done, and how the same things that help me count =
tieknots can help you remember how to tie your tie and broaden your =
repertoire.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">You do not need to bring =
anything - I will be bringing practice ties for everyone to use. If you =
want to use your own tie, you are of course welcome =
to.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">NYC =
Resistor</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">87 Third Avenue, fourth floor, =
Brooklyn</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">7-8p; =
$25</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span =
style=3D"">eventbrite.com/e/tieknots-a-hands-on-intro-on-how-to-count-desc=
ribe-and-tie-tieknots-tickets-740165704547</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">***** LEARNING: WEDNESDAY =
*****</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">World Socialist Cinema: A =
lecture by Masha Salazkina</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Light Industry will be hosting =
a talk by scholar Masha Salazkina, related to her recent book World =
Socialist Cinema. Its focus is the Festival of Cinemas of Asia, Africa, =
and Latin America, which took place in Tashkent, the capital of Soviet =
Uzbekistan, from the 1960s to the 1980s. Salazkina uses the history of =
this festival as an aperture into a unique configuration of world =
cinema, one that emerged through the entanglement of internationalist =
solidarities and trans-racial affinities, of personal bonds and =
institutional connections, of multi-faceted artistic expressions and =
political commitments.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Light =
Industry</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">361 Stagg Street, suite 407, =
Brooklyn</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">7p; $10 suggested =
donation</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span =
style=3D"">lightindustry.org/salazkina</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">***** LEARNING: THURSDAY =
*****</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Podcast =
School</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">In the crowded podcast-scape, =
the stories that break through the noise often reside in the space =
between genres; the work that feels most alive borrows techniques from =
audio drama and memoir, from reporting and poetry and cinema =
alike.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Chloe, accompanied by an =
extraordinary roster of guest instructors, will draw back the curtain =
and break down how to make innovative work that bends the rules. The =
workshop will go inside work that views sound as instrumental and not =
incidental to telling impactful stories in audio. It will explore work =
that embraces the subjective -- the personal, the political, the =
experimental. And it will examine how fiction can be a way to get at the =
truth.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Union =
Docs</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">352 Onderdonk Avenue, =
Bushwick</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">10a-4:30p, Nov 30 - Dec 3; =
$385 before November 24, $425 after</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span =
style=3D"">uniondocs.org/event/podcast-school-2023/</span></span></span></=
div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">***** LEARNING: THURSDAY =
*****</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Brooklyn =
Miniaturists</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Danny Cortes, Aaron Kinard, =
and Jack Giambanco have many things in common. They are all longtime =
Brooklynites, all self-taught artists whose passion for making =
miniatures took hold in just the last few years, and all make work that =
represents Brooklyn in stunningly intricate detail. Join them in a =
conversation about their craft, Brooklyn, and how they found themselves =
in this world of tiny art. </span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Center for Brooklyn =
History</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">128 Pierrepont Street, =
Brooklyn</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">6:30-7:30p; =
$free</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span =
style=3D"">bklynlibrary.org/calendar/cbh-talk-brooklyn-center-for-brooklyn=
-20231130</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">***** LEARNING: THURSDAY =
*****</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Drug Testing =
Workshop</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Curious about what you =
=E2=80=9Cdon=E2=80=99t know you don=E2=80=99t know=E2=80=9D about =
psychedelic safety? Interested in seeing drug testing firsthand? =
</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Join us for an evening with =
harm reduction educator Mohawk Kellye Greene, who knows better than most =
the dangers and concerns present out there in New York=E2=80=99s =
Psychedelic Wilds.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Drug testing: Learn to wield a =
reagent kit to test ketamine, MDMA, LSD, and other substances with a =
step-by-step demonstration. Understand the science behind how reagents =
detect potential adulterants and leave with confidence in your ability =
to use your kit independently.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Talk and Q&amp;A: Stay =
informed about the latest adulterants entering the scene, hear stories =
from the front lines of harm reduction, and bring your toughest and most =
pressing questions about psychedelic safety to the =
Q+A.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Why =
Attend?</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Empowerment: Equip yourself =
with the skills to take control of your own safety, and come away with =
your own fentanyl test strip and reagent kit.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Knowledge: Gain a deep =
understanding of harm reduction practices, promoting responsible and =
conscious use of psychedelic substances.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Connection: Connect with a =
community of like-minded individuals who prioritize well-being and =
education within the realm of psychedelics.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Whether you're a seasoned =
psychonaut or new to the psychedelic scene, this is your chance to gain =
personalized insights, dispel myths, hear stories from the festival =
scene, and receive practical advice on harm-reduction =
strategies.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">(Note: no scheduled substances =
are permitted at the venue.)</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Brooklyn Psychedelic =
Society</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Social Hour Room, 110 =
Schermerhorn Street, Brooklyn</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">7-9p; =
$10</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span =
style=3D"">bps.community/event-details/drug-testing-workshop-with-mohawk-g=
reene</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">***** LEARNING: UPCOMING =
*****</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">GLOwanus Light Installation =
Giveaway</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">GLOwanus is a public art =
project designed to inform Gowanus residents about water quality in the =
Gowanus Canal. Join us in December for the official launch of the =
newly-designed GLOwanus light at our neighborhood giveaway =
event.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Open to all ages; participants =
under 18 must attend with an adult. Light refreshments and snacks will =
be served.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Designed by Brooklyn-based =
artists Manav Singla and Ridima Jain, GLOwanus is a small lantern that =
flashes when the Gowanus Canal is under a City-issued waterbody advisory =
-- meaning there=E2=80=99s a good chance Combined Sewer Overflow (CSO) =
has recently spilled or may soon spill into the Canal. When GLOwanus =
flashes, it=E2=80=99s signaling that untreated wastewater is polluting =
or has recently polluted the Canal. Using less water in your home or =
business, especially immediately before and during rainstorms, is one =
way to help reduce the level of CSO.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">Van Alen =
Institute</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">303 Bond Street, =
Brooklyn</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">12:30-2p; =
$free</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span =
style=3D"">eventbrite.com/e/glowanus-light-installation-giveaway-tickets-7=
60688057457</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">XXXXX HELP =
XXXXX</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">We want to help you find help =
for short-term projects. Do you have a project, an event, or an action =
that needs an extra push, a few more people, or an extra set of hands? =
Please send your calls for help to: =
help]at]nonsensenyc.com.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">XXXXX NONSENSE =
XXXXX</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">nonsense nyc is a =
discriminating resource for independent art, weird events, strange =
happenings, unique parties, and senseless culture in new york =
city.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span =
style=3D"">&nbsp;</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">please remember you are =
welcome to pass nonsense along to anyone who needs to see it, but you do =
not have permission to use any of the listings for your commercial =
endeavor. if you are receiving this list as a forward you can sign up =
for yourself at nonsensenyc.com/subscribe.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span =
style=3D"">&nbsp;</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;"><span =
style=3D"font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;"><span =
style=3D"font-size:12pt"><span style=3D"">if you believe independent =
artists should support other independent artists, we accept donations. =
here's a link to support nonsense all year long: =
https://withfriends.co/nonsense_nyc/join. =
thanks.</span></span></span></div>

<div class=3D"Body" style=3D"border: medium;">&nbsp;</div>
